pkgmetadata.longdescription: Testing One Hypothesis Twice in Observational Studies // Tests one hypothesis with several test statistics, correcting for multiple testing. The central function in the package is testtwice(). In a sensitivity analysis, the method has the largest design sensitivity of its component tests. The package implements the method and examples in Rosenbaum, P. R. (2012) doi:10.1093/biomet/ass032 Testing one hypothesis twice in observational studies. Biometrika, 99(4), 763-774.
